meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a listener.
meanings.sent1: Her listenership during the lecture was evident from her attentive expression.
meanings.sent2: The radio station's listenership increased after they started playing more popular songs.
meanings.sent3: The cat's listenership of the birds outside was comical as it tried to mimic their chirping.
meanings.sent4: His listenership of the wind in the trees made him feel connected to nature.
meanings.sent5: The listenership of the audience was crucial for the success of the podcast.

meanings.sent1: Active listenership is important in effective communication.
meanings.sent2: His listenership of the music was so intense that he could hear every note.
meanings.sent3: The dog's listenership of commands was impressive as it followed them perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her listenership of the rain tapping on the window was calming.
meanings.sent5: The child's listenership of the story was evident from the way his eyes lit up.
